content: This marketing brief outlines a campaign for a product called PTInsights, a tool that provides insights to optimize shop performance and profitability for independent auto repair shops and collision centers, MSOs, shop managers, service advisors, and parts managers, who are current or past users of PartsTrader. The campaign's main objective is to raise awareness of PTInsights among current and past users of PartsTrader, drive traffic to the PTInsights page on the PartsTrader website and increase usage and recurring usage of PTInsights. The campaign will utilize various elements such as the hero section of the PartsTrader website, social media promotions, a 4-email drip campaign, "metric emails" that provide shop owners with their actual shop data and drive them to the report dashboards, and in-app ads. The campaign's metrics and deliverables are carefully planned and executed to track progress and make adjustments as needed.
